title: Entwined With You
description: he series everyone is talking about reaches an earth-shaking crescendo in Entwined with You, Book 3 of the sensational Crossfire series. It began as an instant, undeniable connection between Eva Tramell and multimillionaire Gideon Cross on Eva's first day at Cross Industries. But even as their erotic encounters have grown far hotter, almost unbearably ecstatic, their emotions have grown much darker and more painful, as the desperate, damaged lovers find themselves battling the demons of their harrowing pasts in an attempt to create a happy future. Now, in Sylvia Day's latest sizzling tale, Eva and Gideon must confront the consequences of their obsessive desires...whether it binds them together or tears them apart forever!
author: Sylvia Day
